text:
Please select the option that most accurately completes the following sentence in each case. If you choose "something else," you will be given an opportunity to explain. My experience with this skill in
Working effectively and appropriately with various media
(i.e., for school) comes...
hover: e.g., researching and composing in appropriate modes, such as alphabetic, visual, audio
